ygData.subject: RE: Lyssa's Voracious Concord
ygData.msgSnippet: Forgot about the see invis.  No I haven t figured that out about lightstones actually since I m a wood elf, and my cleric is a gnome, and... You get the
ygData.messageBody:
Forgot about the see invis. No I haven't figured that out about lightstones
actually since I'm a wood elf, and my cleric is a gnome, and... You get the
picture.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Friday, October 01, 1999 10:12 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lyssa's Voracious Concord


From: <kim@...>

On Fri, 1 Oct 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> What's the incentive to sing it at all? Just to see things kinda purply
at
> night? By that time few bards will have trouble getting a light source,
> hell every vendor in sight has a lightstone available for a plat.

If you haven't figured it out yet, lightstones stink in large,
flat zones (ones with big polygons) like the Karanas or
Commonlands - they will only light up the surroundings when
you are at the corners of a polygon.

This song gives ultravision, as well as see invisible.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
